mapper.insert: insert into admin_inquire values(seq_admin_inquire_no.nextval, #{inquireNo}, #{adminId}, #{adminName}, #{content}, default, default)
mapper.select: select extract(month from m.enroll_date) ,count(*) from member m where extract(month from m.enroll_date) is not null group by extract(month from m.enroll_date) order by extract(month from m.enroll_date) asc
